Speculum nauticum a looking glasse for sea-men : wherein they may behold a small instrument called the plain scale whereby all questions nautical and propositions astronomical are very easily and demonstratively wrought ... / by Iohn Aspley. Aspley, John.
The fourth edition corrected.
[6], 61 p. : ill.
Printed by Thomas Harper and are to be sold by George Hurlock, London : 1647.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
